title: Sales Order
description: Details of the customer sales order and product line items, payment and totals.

orderSource.description: Source from where the order was received

invoiceNumber.description: Invoice number generated by the source system with regards to the Purchase orders.

customerLocale.description: Determines the language that the customer sees on the web shop front.

taxIncluded.description: Indicates if the order has the GST applied or not

onHold.description: Flag to initiate 'Fraud Check Or High Dollar Value check'. When the order value crosses the configured amount, fraud check process kicks in to validate the authenticity of the order.

returnOrderSource.description: This field represents source from where the return order process was initiated.

businessToBusinessOrder.description: Indicates whether the particular order is a buiness-to-business (B2B) order or not.

eventDateTime.description: DateTimestamp at which the event was generated

sms.description: Value to determine it the customer has opted for SMS notification

email.description: Value to determine it the customer has opted for email notification

push.description: Value to determine it the customer has opted for Push notification to mobile app

identifier.description: A unique identifier for the party

guest.description: Identifies for a party buying goods online if they are a Guest or not

code.description: Code to define type of party

identifier.description: Unique Identifier for a given location

address.description: Address of location as defined by address type

firstName.description: First Name of contact at address

lastName.description: Last Name of contact at address

attentionOfName.description: Attention of person who may notbe primary contact at address

countryCode.description: Country code for address as defined in country code enum

countryName.description: Country name for address as defined in countryName enum
enum: Congo, the Democratic Republic of the
Macedonia, the Former Yugoslav Republic of
Saint Helena, Ascension and Tristan da Cunha
South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands

phoneNumber.description: Contact Phone Number and Country Dialing Code Details

emailAddress.description: Party Email address. When unencrypted it will be type ./common-v4 /definitions/email

taxCountryCode.description: Country Code of TAX responsibility for party

taxCountryName.description: Country Name of TAX responsibility for party
enum: Congo, the Democratic Republic of the
Macedonia, the Former Yugoslav Republic of
Saint Helena, Ascension and Tristan da Cunha
South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands

accountNumber.description: This field represents the Farmlands Account Number or BizRewards Account Number or Approved Debtors Number if a customer has used any to place an order

accountType.description: The type of customer account for which the order is placed.

accountName.description: This field represents the business account name of the customer placing the order.

cardHolderName.description: The holders name on the card used for payment

expiryMonth.description: The 2 digit month when the payment card expires. on credit cards March is noted as '03'

expiryYear.description: Last two digits of the year when payment card expires

status.description: Represents the status of the transaction for the order

amount.description: Amount that was charged against the order from the card.
The amount in the specified currency

processorIdentifier.description: ID for the payment processor used for processing the order payment

transactionIdentifier.description: Unique transaction ID sent from the payment processor.

authorisationCode.description: Alphanumeric password that authorises its user to purchase

liabilityIndicator.description: The liability indicator for the card payment.

responseText.description: Response received from the processor for the transaction

sessionIdentifier.description: Session ID for the processed payment

transactionType.description: This transaction type to ensure that funds are available on a card holders credit card

accountHolder.description: Account holder name for the A2A bank transfer

status.description: Represents the status of the transaction for the order

amount.description: Amount to be processed for the order
The amount in the specified currency

processorIdentifier.description: ID for the payment processor used for processing the order payment

transactionIdentifier.description: Unique transaction ID sent from the payment processor.

authorisationCode.description: Alphanumeric password that authorises its user to purchase

liabilityIndicator.description: The liability indicator for the card payment.

responseText.description: Response received from the processor for the transaction

sessionIdentifier.description: Session ID for the payment processed

clickToPay.description: clickToPay is formerly Visa checkout managed by Visa

maskedCardNumber.description: The masked card number used for the payment.

amount.description: Amount paid for the order
The amount in the specified currency

processorIdentifier.description: ID for the payment processor used for processing the order payment

transactionIdentifier.description: Unique transaction ID sent from the payment processor.

authorisationCode.description: Alphanumeric password that authorises its user to purchase

liabilityIndicator.description: The liability indicator for the card payment.

responseText.description: Response received from the processor for the transaction

sessionIdentifier.description: Session ID for the payment processed

identifier.description: Unique part pay order ID for the payment

processorIdentifier.description: ID for the payment processor used for processing the order payment

transactionIdentifier.description: Transaction ID for the order payment

status.description: Status received from the processor for the transaction

amount.description: Amount paid for the order
The amount in the specified currency

tillIdentifier.description: Till number from which the order was placed

storeIdentifier.description: Store number from where the order was placed

employeeCode.description: The unique identifier for each person that is registered as an employee

partPayRemoteHost.description: IP address for the customers device

amount.description: Total payment amount to be processed for the order
The amount in the specified currency

processorIdentifier.description: Identifier for the payment processor used for processing the order payment.

transactionIdentifier.description: Unique transaction identifier sent from the payment processor.

transactionType.description: This transaction type to ensure that funds are available on a card holder account.

authorisedAmount.description: Total authorised payment amount for the order

amount.description: The amount in the specified currency

authorisedCode.description: A unique code generated to approve a transaction.

bankReceipt.description: Bank receipt identifier for the POLi payment

bankReceiptDatetime.description: Bank receipt date and time refer to the specific datetime when POLi payment was processed by the bank.

countryCode.description: Country Code for the transaction. Remove this as this is incorrect enum

firstName.description: First Name of contact at address

lastName.description: Last Name of contact at address

attentionOfName.description: Attention of person who may notbe primary contact at address

phoneNumber.description: Contact Phone Number and Country Dialing Code Details

startDatetime.description: Start datetime for the POLi payment refer to the exact moment when the customer clicking on the 'Pay with POLi' button on merchant's website

endDatetime.description: End datetime for the POLi payment session refer to the exact moment when the transaction is completed.

establishDatetime.description: Established datetime for the POLi payment session refer to the moment after customer clicking on the 'Pay with POLi' button and is redirected to the POLi payment page.

financialInstitutionCode.description: Financial institution code used by the customer to pay for the order

financialInstitutionName.description: Financial institution name used by the customer to pay for the order

merchantAccountName.description: Name of the merchant account to whom the payment is made

merchantSortCode.description: The first six digits of the receiving account number

merchantAccountNumber.description: Unique seven digit account number of the merchant

merchantReferenceData.description: Additional custom information that merchants can include as part of their POLi payment requests. This data is defined by the merchant and can include order number for the payment.

merchantReference.description: Unique identifier assigned to each payment transaction made through POLi payment system. This is standard identifier that is automatically generated by POLi.

payerSortCode.description: The first six digits of the payer's account number.

payerAccountNumber.description: Unique seven digit account number of the payer

amount.description: Total payment amount to be processed for the order
The amount in the specified currency

processorIdentifier.description: Identifier for the payment processor used for processing the order payment

requestType.description: Indicates the type of credit check request.

authorizationKey.description: A unique code generated to approve a transaction.

total.description: Net total price for all the items in the order summed

netPrice.description: The products price after discounts applying in purchase currency.

amount.description: The amount in the specified currency

tax.description: Tax amount applied on the products before services such as shipping have been added

amount.description: The amount in the specified currency

grossPrice.description: Gross price represents the sum of adjustment merchandise prices and adjustments, including services and tax

amount.description: The amount in the specified currency

items.description: Any price adjustments applied to the order

netPrice.description: Price adjusted to the line item due to discounts, promotions, or extra charges

amount.description: The amount in the specified currency

tax.description: Tax applied to each product line separately for the adjusted amount.

amount.description: The amount in the specified currency

grossPrice.description: The gross price for the line item, which is the price of the unit before applying adjustments, in the purchase currency, including tax

amount.description: The amount in the specified currency

basePrice.description: The adjusted base price for the line item in the purchase currency.  This amount is deducted from lineitem price to have the final value.

amount.description: The amount in the specified currency

lineItemText.description: Description of the price adjustment applied for the lineitem.
lineItemText.example: Buy 1 get 1 HALF PRICE Nivea Products

promotionIdentifier.description: Promotion ID applied to the line item to apply the discount.

campaignIdentifier.description: Campaign ID (if there is any active) applied against the line.

reasonCode.description: Capture the reason on the source system e.g. CS module if any adjustment was applied.

couponCode.description: Coupon code applied by the customer for shipping in the order

manualAdjustment.description: Value set as true if a customer was given the adjustment manually.

discountType.description: Type of discount applied for each line. Fixed/percentage.

discountValue.description: Specifies how much discount was applied for the line time

amount.description: The amount in the specified currency

createdBy.description: Capture the email of the user applying the discount

createdDatetime.description: Date and time when the discount was applied to an order.

adjustedSaleItems.description: The products price after discounts applying in purchase currency

netPrice.description: The products price after discounts applying in purchase currency.

identifier.description: Unique Identifier for item being shipped

items.description: Unique External Identifier for item being shipped

producer.description: List of all the potential producers

returnMerchandiseAuthorisationIdentifier.description: Indicates the unique identifier to authorise the returns of a product for a refund, replacement, or repairs.

selfPick.description: Indicates if the order will be fulfilled from the same store as selected by the customer for click and collect location while placing the order.

pointOfSaleItemReturnNotes.description: Notes added by the store users at the Point of Sale location where customers return the item
pointOfSaleItemReturnNotes.example: Item collected, customer unhappy with product

returnStoreLocationIdentifier.description: System assigned unique identifier for a particular location within TWG. Location at which the customer has returned the item.

preorder.description: Identifies if the order line is preorder item.

fulfilmentLocationIdentifier.description: System assigned unique identifier for a particular location within TWG. Location at which the customer has returned the item.

fulfilmentPromiseDatetime.description: Indicates the date on which an order is promised to be fulfilled to the customer based on the sales order.

consolidation.description: Indicates if the order line is to be consolidated as part of the order consolidation at the fulfillment location.

consolidationLocationIdentifier.description: System assigned unique identifier for a particular location within TWG.Represents the location where the order line will be consolidated with another order line for order fulfillment.

requestedDeliveryDatetime.description: Indicates the date on which an order is promised to be fulfilled to the customer based on the sales order.

channelType.description: Defines which channel the item is to be fulfilled through. A third party or within TWG network (in-house).

merchantIdentifier.description: Unique identifier of the merchant for the item ordered. Merchant identifier will be supplied along with the item detail for third party

merchantName.description: Identifies the name of the merchant for the item ordered. Merchant name will be supplied along with the item detail for third party.

unitOfMeasure.description: Unit of measure for the item

netPrice.description: Net price charged for each line item in the order. Comes from the source system. Value of the item that the customer will pay.

amount.description: The amount in the specified currency

grossPrice.description: Gross price for the product line item. (Net Price + Tax)

amount.description: The amount in the specified currency

basePrice.description: The base price for the line item (single unit), in the purchase currency. Also referred as Unit price (not including any discounts)

amount.description: The amount in the specified currency

taxRate.description: This will be the GST value accepted as 2 decimals.

taxAmount.description: tax amount charged for each line item

amount.description: The amount in the specified currency

gift.description: Value set as true if the customer selects the item to be a gift.

globalTradeItemNumber.description: Primary Global Trade Item Number assigned to the Item Identifier within its respective source system

fulfillmentPromise.description: Promise to the customer for delivering the product

priceBookIdentifier.description: Identifies if the item was sold on List price or any specific price ID defined at source.

country.description: List of Alpha-2 and Alpha-3 ISO Country codes

itemColour.description: Colour of the item as selected by the customer while purchasing the order.

itemSize.description: Item size as selected by the customer as selected on the source for placing the order

items.description: Any price adjustments applied to the order

netPrice.description: Price adjusted to the line item due to discounts, promotions, or extra charges

amount.description: The amount in the specified currency

tax.description: Tax applied to each product line separately for the adjusted amount.

lineItemText.example: Buy 1 get 1 HALF PRICE Nivea Products

campaignIdentifier.description: Campaign ID (if there is any active) applied against the line.

reasonCode.description: Capture the reason on the source system e.g. CS module if any adjustment was applied.

couponCode.description: Coupon code applied by the customer for shipping in the order

manualAdjustment.description: Value set as true if a customer was given the adjustment manually.

discountValue.description: Specifies how much discount was applied for the line time

amount.description: The amount in the specified currency

createdBy.description: Capture the email of the user applying the discount

createdDatetime.description: Date and time when the discount was applied to an order.

returnReceipt.description: Does the customer expect a receipt for the return

cancelIdentifier.description: This field represents the order line cancel identifier for specific order line if the order line is cancelled

pointOfSaleRefundedQuantity.description: Quantity of an item that was refunded at the  point of sale location to the customer at an instance in a store.

pointOfSaleTotalRefundedQuantity.description: Total cumulative quantity of an item that was refunded at the point of sale location to the customer for the order line.

type.description: Identifies if the order line item is delivery or pickup.

method.description: Identifies how the item line item will be shipped.

firstName.description: First Name of contact at address

lastName.description: Last Name of contact at address

attentionOfName.description: Attention of person who may notbe primary contact at address

countryCode.description: Country code for address as defined in country code enum

countryName.description: Country name for address as defined in countryName enum

storeEmail.description: Email address of the store where the customer will be collecting the goods. When unencrypted it will be type ./common-v4 /definitions/email

digitalRecipientName.description: The recipient of the digitally shipped product.
